name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 5th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン5周年記念⁠】 [KdFYu1feK30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion performs the song 'Mikazuki' on stage.
MC section where Murasaki Shion talks about the songs she sang, introduces her 5th anniversary stage set, and reflects on her five years as a VTuber.
Murasaki Shion, Tokoyami Towa, and Nekomata Okayu perform the song 'Rettou Joutou' in a city street setting.

subtitles.original: ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: Mikazuki

subtitles.original: いつかは君のままだと
subtitles.english: Sometime, as you are

subtitles.original: 笑っている
subtitles.english: smiling.

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: I wanna be、かいじゅうの花唄、ミカヅキでしたー！
subtitles.english: That was "I wanna be," "Kaijuu no Hanauta," and "Mikazuki"!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: みんな見てるー？ちゃんと見てたー？
subtitles.english: Is everyone watching? Were you watching closely?

subtitles.original: 3曲ね、連続で最初から歌っちゃいましたけど、どうでしたか？
subtitles.english: I sang three songs in a row right from the start. How was it?

subtitles.original: 可愛かった？
subtitles.english: Was I cute?

subtitles.original: ま、きっと可愛かったでしょう。えへへ。
subtitles.english: Well, I'm sure I was. Ehehe.

subtitles.original: ねぇ見て、ステージすごくない？見て、これ。
subtitles.english: Hey, look, isn't the stage amazing? Look at this.

subtitles.original: すごいでしょ！超可愛いよ。
subtitles.english: Isn't it great! It's super cute.

subtitles.original: ほら、上とかさ、お月様があって...
subtitles.english: Look, up there's the moon...

subtitles.original: 塩っ子もいて、あ、カメラマンやってくれてるんだよね、上に3人。
subtitles.english: And there are Shiokko. Oh, they're acting as cameramen, the three up there.

subtitles.original: 見て、見えるかな？
subtitles.english: Look, can you see them?

subtitles.original: あいつ、あいつら。
subtitles.english: Those guys, right there.

subtitles.original: あ、照明らしい。ははは。
subtitles.english: Oh, apparently they're lighting. Hahaha.

subtitles.original: 照明らしい。かわ、え、可愛い。めっちゃ可愛いじゃん。
subtitles.english: Apparently lighting. Cu- wait, cute. They're so cute.

subtitles.original: そう、超可愛いんだよ。塩っ子もね、帽子被ってて、めっちゃ可愛いんだ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, they're super cute. The Shiokko are wearing hats, they're so cute.

subtitles.original: こっち、ここにもいるけど。
subtitles.english: There's one over here too.

subtitles.original: これ何持ってんだろね？
subtitles.english: I wonder what they're holding?

subtitles.original: うまい棒みたいなの持ってる。
subtitles.english: They're holding something that looks like Umaibou.

subtitles.original: でね、でね、見て見て。こっち！
subtitles.english: And, and, look, look. Over here!

subtitles.original: ほら見て！こいつ超可愛い！見て！
subtitles.english: Look at this! This guy is super cute! Look!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: あ、いいじゃんこれ。写真撮ってください！
subtitles.english: Ah, this is great. Please take a photo!

subtitles.original: え、可愛いでしょ！
subtitles.english: Isn't it cute!

subtitles.original: これはね、メイド衣装のここについてるあの、ぬいぐるみだね。
subtitles.english: This is the plushie that's attached to my maid outfit.

subtitles.original: 目玉の、目玉がボタンのぬいぐるみね。
subtitles.english: The plushie with buttons for eyes.

subtitles.original: いや超可愛いんだよ。下はね、魔法陣になってんだよね。
subtitles.english: It's so cute. And the floor is a magic circle.

subtitles.original: いや可愛すぎる本当に。めっちゃピンクと紫で超可愛い。
subtitles.english: It's really too cute. All the pink and purple is super cute.

subtitles.original: ということで、新しいステージでした。
subtitles.english: So, this was the new stage.

subtitles.original: 可愛いでしょ！めっちゃシオンっぽくて超可愛いよね。
subtitles.english: It's cute, right! It's so Shion-like and super cute.

subtitles.original: であとね、後ろの絵！
subtitles.english: And also, the picture in the back!

subtitles.original: これが今回のサムネ의 イラストなんだけど、あれ？
subtitles.english: This is the illustration for this time's thumbnail, but... wait?

subtitles.original: なんか、周りにね、いっぱいいてね... これね...
subtitles.english: There's, like, a lot of people around... And this...

subtitles.original: 誰だろう？
subtitles.english: I wonder who they are?

subtitles.original: え、誰だろう誰だろう。え、もしかして出てくるのかな？この先。
subtitles.english: I wonder who, I wonder who. Could it be they'll show up later on?

subtitles.original: え、どうなんだろう。いや分かんないな、分かんないんだけど、かも知れないよね。
subtitles.english: Well, I wonder. I don't know, I don't know, but it might be.

subtitles.original: かも知れないんだよね。イラスト超可愛いっしょ、これ。サムネなんだけどね。
subtitles.english: It might be. The illustration is super cute, right? It's the thumbnail.

subtitles.original: ということで、なんと気づけばもう5年も経ってしまっていました。
subtitles.english: So, before I knew it, five years had already passed.

subtitles.original: 怖すぎる。
subtitles.english: It's too scary.

subtitles.original: まだ気分は新人バーチャルYouTuberなのに！
subtitles.english: Even though I still feel like a rookie Virtual YouTuber!

subtitles.original: 怖すぎるよ！はぁー。
subtitles.english: Too scary! Haa.

subtitles.original: 5年目も頑張るぞー！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best in my fifth year too!

subtitles.original: ということで、あ、ハッシュタグは紫咲シオン5周年記念で、
subtitles.english: And also, the hashtag is #紫咲シオン5周年記念,

subtitles.original: みんなたくさん可愛い写真撮ってツイートしてください。後で見るよ。
subtitles.english: so please take lots of cute photos and tweet them. I'll check them later.

subtitles.original: はい、というわけで、ここからはゲストパートです！
subtitles.english: Alright, and with that, from here on is the guest part!

subtitles.original: 最後までたっぷりあるので、ぜひ見てってください。
subtitles.english: There's plenty more until the end, so please keep watching.

subtitles.original: 最後まで見てね！
subtitles.english: Watch until the very end!

subtitles.original: 頑張るぞー！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等
subtitles.english: Inferiority Superiority / Bring It On

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 Bring it on
subtitles.english: Inferiority Superiority, bring it on!

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 in Japan
subtitles.english: Inferiority Superiority in Japan!

subtitles.original: 子供騙しのマセマティカ
subtitles.english: Child's play Mathematica,

subtitles.original: バレてんだってそんなんじゃプライドがない
subtitles.english: it's obvious, you have no pride like that.

subtitles.original: 媚びへつらい上機嫌で
subtitles.english: Flattering others in high spirits,

subtitles.original: 他人の見物ばかりじゃつまんねぇ
subtitles.english: just watching others is boring.

subtitles.original: ほらもっと
subtitles.english: Look, more,

subtitles.original: 間違って
subtitles.english: make mistakes,

subtitles.original: ちょっと
subtitles.english: just a bit,

subtitles.original: 退屈に手をかけて
subtitles.english: give a hand to the boredom.

subtitles.original: ママ、やっぱ私は
subtitles.english: Mama, as I thought, I...

subtitles.original: こんなところじゃ終われない
subtitles.english: ...can't end in a place like this.

subtitles.original: ぬるくて気が触れそう
subtitles.english: It's so lukewarm I'm going crazy,

subtitles.original: ごっこ遊びも芝居もさよなら
subtitles.english: goodbye to playing pretend and acting.

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままなんてさ
subtitles.english: Staying like this forever is...

subtitles.original: いられない
subtitles.english: ...something I can't do.

subtitles.original: ダッ ダッ ダッ 私大人になる
subtitles.english: Da, da, da, I'm going to grow up.

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも噛み分けて今
subtitles.english: Having tasted both the bitter and the sweet, now,

subtitles.original: パッ パッ パッ 変わる時代
subtitles.english: pa, pa, pa, the era changes.

subtitles.original: 悪いことばかりじゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: It's not all bad things, right?

subtitles.original: 過去も、罪も、罰も、すべて
subtitles.english: Past, sins, punishment, everything,

subtitles.original: 素手で、愛で、生き抜いてやり返すわ
subtitles.english: I'll survive with my bare hands and love, and I'll strike back.

subtitles.original: Yeah! 注目！あたしたちはナンバーワン
subtitles.english: Yeah! Attention! We are number one!
